definitions.definition: An elongated, boneless , flexible organ or limb of some animals , such as the octopus and squid .
One of the glandular hairs on the leaves of certain insectivorous plants .

examples: the tentacles of the criminal underworld

definitions.definition: An officer employed to drive out to troops and transmit back requests for support via a special radio link.

main_definition: ( zoology ) An elongated, boneless , flexible organ or limb of some animals , such as the octopus and squid .
secondary_definitions: ( botany ) One of the glandular hairs on the leaves of certain insectivorous plants .
( figurative ) An insidious reach or influence .
( figurative ) Something like a zoological limb.
( UK , military , historical ) An officer employed to drive out to troops and transmit back requests for support via a special radio link.
